queryset_client.get_version(version=None)[source]¶

PEP386-compliant

class queryset_client.client.Client(base_url, auth=None, client=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

request(url, method='GET')[source]¶

base requester

  • accept format below for url.

    • http://api.base.biz/base/v1/path/to/api/?id=1
    • /base/v1/path/to/api/?id=1
    • /v1/path/to/api/?id=1
    • /path/to/api/?id=1
Parameters:
  • url – target url
  • method – GET or POST (default: GET)
Return type:

json
Returns:

json object
